IGIT Horizon is the premier annual technical fest of **Indira Gandhi Institute of Technology (IGIT), Sarang**. It brings together tech enthusiasts, innovators, and creators to showcase their talents, engage in exciting competitions, and participate in hands-on workshops.

Join us as we **Follow the Horizon 2K25** and explore new frontiers in technology and innovation!
